on some hot hotels in Miami Also be sure to check out these roundtrip fares from Portland Please note that these fares must be purchased by If you purchase airline tickets online by February you will receive FREE EXPRESS DELIVERY an additional savings of off the below fares And to help you complete your travel plans rent an Alamo car through Cheap Tickets and get a fullsize car for the price of a wwwcheapticketscomspecialscarshtml for more information or to find a rental car HOTEL SPECIALS Here are just a few of our hot Miami hotel specials SONESTA BEACH RESORT FROM The Sonesta Beach Resort Key Biscayne is a deluxe class hotel located on a secluded tropical island paradise The hotel has a restaurant outdoor pool fitness center beach water sports and more RITZ PLAZA FROM The Ritz Plaza Miami Beach is a first class hotel located on the ocean in the heart of South Beach The hotel has a restaurant pool bar and grill outdoor pool lounge and more Many shops and restaurants are nearby DEZERLAND FROM The Dezerland Hotel is a newly upgraded hotel located directly on the ocean in North Miami The hotel has a lounge outdoor pool snack bar gift shop tennis courts restaurant and more CHESTERFIELD FROM The Chesterfield hotel is an intimate superior tourist class hotel located in the heart of South Beach and the Art Deco historic district A complimentary breakfast is served daily and world famous shopping is minutes away CASABLANCA FROM The Casablanca Hotel is a first class hotel located in North Miami Beach The hotel has a restaurant tikki bar heated outdoor pool private access beach restaurant and more CHELSEA FROM The Hotel Chelsea is a boutique hotel located in the heart of the Art Deco district on South Beach The hotel has free continental breakfast happy hour with Sake fast Internet access VIP passes to all the hottest clubs on South Beach and more Need another hotel Visit wwwcheapticketscomhotels to search or call to speak to a hotel specialist The above hotel rates are subject to limited availability and are subject to change without notice All rates are valid until February CRUISE SPECIALS Call our cruise specialists at to find great deals on the
